tool_description: Calculates the semantic relatedness/similarity between pairs of text excerpts based on the likeness of their meaning  or semantic content.
name: ESA Semantic Relatedness
title: ESA Semantic Relatedness

api_list.name: Relatedness
api_list.description: Calculates the semantic relatedness between pairs of text excerpts based on the likeness of their meaning  or semantic content.

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: The language of the texts you are submitting. Supported languages are en (for English) and pt (for Portuguese).

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amtera.p.rapidapi.com/relatedness/en"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amtera.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://amtera.p.rapidapi.com/relatedness/{lang}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amtera.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
